name: tearful-look
caption: Tearful Look

effect.short: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.
effect.full: Lowers the target's [Attack]{mechanic:attack} and [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} by one stage each.

flavorText:
The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose
